name: Sylvanas
title: The Banshee Queen
description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

abilities.name: Withering Fire
abilities.description: Shoot the closest enemy for 48 damage, preferring Heroes. Gain 1 charge on nearby enemy Minion or Mercenary deaths, and 3 charges on nearby enemy Hero deaths. Stores up to 5 charges.

abilities.name: Shadow Dagger
abilities.description: Deals 37 damage and an additional 148 damage over 2 seconds to target unit. The effect spreads to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Haunting Wave
abilities.description: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

heroics.name: Wailing Arrow
heroics.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

heroics.name: Mind Control
heroics.description: After a 1 second cast, take control of an enemy Hero's movement, Silencing them and prevent them from doing anything else. Channel lasts 2.5 seconds.

original.name: Sylvanas
original.title: The Banshee Queen
original.description: Sylvanas Windrunner was not always the Dark Lady of the Forsaken. In another life, she was the Ranger-General of Silvermoon. But that was before the Death Knight Arthas slew her and her people and raised her as the first Banshee.
original.shortDescription: An Assassin who can shut down enemy Forts and Keeps.

baseHeroInfo.name: Sylvanas
baseHeroInfo.title: The Banshee Queen
baseHeroInfo.description: Sylvanas Windrunner was not always the Dark Lady of the Forsaken. In another life, she was the Ranger-General of Silvermoon. But that was before the Death Knight Arthas slew her and her people and raised her as the first Banshee.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: An Assassin who can shut down enemy Forts and Keeps.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

trait.name: Black Arrows
trait.description: Basic Attacks and Abilities stun Minions, Mercenaries, and Structures for 1 second.

abilities.name: Withering Fire
abilities.description: Shoot the closest enemy for 48 damage, preferring Heroes. Gain 1 charge on nearby enemy Minion or Mercenary deaths, and 3 charges on nearby enemy Hero deaths. Stores up to 5 charges.

abilities.name: Shadow Dagger
abilities.description: Deals 37 damage and an additional 148 damage over 2 seconds to target unit. The effect spreads to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Haunting Wave
abilities.description: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

heroicAbilities.name: Wailing Arrow
heroicAbilities.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 damage and silence enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

heroicAbilities.name: Mind Control
heroicAbilities.description: After a 1 second cast, take control of an enemy Hero's movement, Silencing them and prevent them from doing anything else. Channel lasts 2.5 seconds.

otherAbilities.name: Possession
otherAbilities.description: Force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team. Stores up to 3 charges.

skins.name: The Banshee Queen
skins.description: Sylvanas Windrunner was not always the Dark Lady of the Forsaken. In another life, she was the Ranger-General of Silvermoon. But that was before the Death Knight Arthas slew her and her people and raised her as the first Banshee.

skins.name: Dark Lady Sylvanas
skins.description: The guise of a Dark Ranger strikes fear into the hearts of their enemies. The guise of the Dark Ranger Queen will send them running for reinforcements...

skins.name: Sugar Plum Sylvanas
skins.description: Sugar and spice? Maybe. Everything nice? Not by a long shot.

skins.name: Ranger-General Sylvanas
skins.description: The Ranger-Generals are the commanders of the Farstriders of Quel'Thalas. It is their solemn duty to ensure the protection of Silvermoon, or give their lives in its defense.
